message.body: How'd it go today
Hey do you have a minute to talk
Yeah sure man no speaking tho lol. Also she said yes i'm sorry i forgot to respond!
Haha nice!!!! That's great. I'm so happy for you. Do you know anything about kristy liking me?
Thanks man i'm glad it worked out. Now this is interesting. Today she mentioned she was in the friendzone with some guy and was going to drug and rape hi
m. I, of course, encouraged that plan of action. And she did wanna ask you to prom... What going on?

I have no idea. Nicole (the ghetto chick from the debate team whom I never speak to) started messaging me about how kristy is really upset and I'm being blind and insensitive. Meanwhile I had no idea anything was going on. What the fuck
Lmao leave it to nicole to be hardheaded as fuck. Did she detail anything? Did you message her back?
Yeah I just said I didn't know anything was happening and that I thought we were just friends cuz she treats everyone the same. No "details"
Excellent response! Leave it at that. Women are fucking retarded. She'll love you. She'll hate you. She'll get over it!
Haha thanks! I just don't want to deal with this. Especially now that this year is almost over. I don't give a fuck about anything anymore
Swag seriously. I mean i don't see it as a problem for you. Like, yay, a girl likes you, thats awesome! How's gabby?

Yeah I'm just afraid of the repercussions and/or awkwardness. Also kristy is going to Emory so... Gabby is fine. We don't really get to hang out a lot but I will def make more time for that soon, once there's less schoolwork
KRISTY IS GOING TO EMORY? Ok this could be a problem not for now tho, also nice get that. But seriously four weekends until graduation get on it! Also br
o i deadass think you're gonna win ten thousand dollars for that story

Yeah I really don't know anything, I will just continue to ignore this problem until it goes away. I don't really feel that gabby and I have a promising romantic future, so I don't really feel like I missed any opportunity or have to rush anything. Could be wrong tho. Also you really think so? I didnt think it was that great and it might be too disturbing for the judges of the contest!
Yeah when i read it i was hooked and now that the deadline is like here i've been thinking about it. It had me captivated but it was a little disturbing
lol. But yeah anyway girls are retarded. This girl sandy hit me up today i'm not sure what she wants... Maybe she's pulling a joke. Maybe she's retarded.
Maybe she wants the d you can never tell.
Haha thanks! Girls are so stupid. Whats gonna happen with Michelle
We'll have lunch talk about prom. I'm fine with going as dates or as friends. I have to judge at our next encounter. Alright man i'm hitting the sack, go
odnight!
Alright sounds good. That's what its like with me and G. I'm going to bed too. Good night!
Yo will can i borrow your graphing calculator for two days?
Lol uh yeah sure I don't think I need it
Yeee perhaps i won't need it either. Also anything go down with kristy lmao
No I didn't see her today. Hopefully I can at least make it through this week without confrontation
Lmao i mean it doesn't have to be dramatic unless she drugs and rapes you
Which you encouraged her to do! Yeah I don't want drama, I'll be supah kool about it
Lmao i didn't know it was you getting raped not my fault! Soo what english hw we got?
Uhhh bloody chamber annotations. That's it I think
Aight. Stranger annotations due friday! Gotta get on that
Omg really? I thought she said have the stranger on Friday, like just have the book with you
Hmm idk i'm not taking my chances. She is upset with me.
Word. I'm finally kinda out of the line of fire. I probably won't annotate tho
Lmao apparently you are constantly giving her the fu LOL
Ugghhhh that didn't happen! Lmfao she is legit cray
LOL YOU ARE SO FUNNY IN THIS YEARBOOK
Lmao thanks man, what did i do?
Your picture. Also most likely to rule the world. Also we are not in the debate team photo
I KNOW WHAT THE HELL LAST YEAR DEBATE HAD A PAGE, NOW WHAT IS THIS
